General.Name: Wentworth Resources Ltd
General.Description: Wentworth Resources plc engages in the exploration, development, and production of natural gas and other hydrocarbons. The company owns interest in the Mnazi Bay concession totaling an area of approximately 756 square kilometers located in southern Tanzania. Wentworth Resources plc was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Jersey, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: St Paul?s Gate, Jersey, Jersey, JE1 4TR
